website_summaries.verdict: The affordable Impulse Duo is a likable in-ear Bluetooth headphone that features decent sound, packs up well and is easy to carry around in a pocket.
pros: The iFrogz Impulse Duo is lightweight, comfortable in-ear Bluetooth headphone that's sweat resistant and delivers good sound for its relatively modest price point
It has a nifty magnetic clip system on the inline remote and is rated for 10 hours of battery at moderate volumes
cons: Its lightweight, plastic design makes it seems like it should cost even less

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last 10 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who sleeps with headphones but hates getting tangled in the wires. These do NOT last 10 hours. After 5-6 hours they start beeping and needing to be charged. Unfortunately, these were set aside as a gift and by the time I knew that the 10 hour battery claim wasn't true, it was too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, battery life meh.
customer_reviews.text: (update after 4 months) No longer charges. Would not recommend. ---------------- Do like these a lot. Bought them to work with my running watch (FR645), the low power of the watch has caused trouble with other Bluetooth ears, but thanks to this design with a Bluetooth hub, the connection has been stellar. Sound quality is great. The fit is good for sports but not the most comfortable I've had. As others have mentioned, the battery does not last 10hrs, I'm getting 4-5hrs. Especially given the separate hub that could host a bigger battery, this is disappointing. Easily resolved by charging more frequently...
customer_reviews.author: Elie

customer_reviews.title: these have become my favorite headphones. I use them with my iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write many reviews but I have to give this product a huge thumbs up. Once I got over the fact that they need to be recharged regularly, these have become my favorite headphones. I use them with my iPhone 8, and these are so much better than wired headphones with the annoying adaptor. They’re also super comfortable and don’t fall out of your ear. Sound is great. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Stallone

customer_reviews.title: Poor connectivity even when I am right next to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cons 1.The color is chipping off 2. Poor connectivity even when I am right next to the phone let alone go to another room 3. Battery life is very sad, wouldn't even last me long Pros The sound quality is very good People can hear me well on the other side of the call when I am making or receiving calls Overall disappointed with the build and the connectivities issues and not really able to enjoy the good sound it s able to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: VinaY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Clarity - Highs, Mids and Lows Are Great - Light In Size but A Heavy Hitter In Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a fan of ear buds but my son bought iFrogz and had me try them several nights ago and before the night was over, I ordered my own. The sound in these is precise, the clarity is pure and they are light and comfortable. These are awesome for riding my bike, working in the house or out in the yard. Now my wife wants a set for herself which I will gladly get her.
customer_reviews.author: TBuff

customer_reviews.title: Battery life much shorter than advertised
customer_reviews.text: So, the headphones work. Sound quality is good. However the advertised 10 hour battery life is a gross exaggeration. I've used these from a full charge maybe 5 seperate times and each time the low power warning will start after 3 to 4 hours of use. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not really a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with the battery life of these earbuds. They only play my audiobooks at medium volume for about 4.5 to 5 hours before dying even though they boast a 10 hr battery life. Also the magnet is not as strong as I would like. I wear mine while I work so it may be different for other people but just a slight pull will pull them off of your shirt collar or strap. Honestly, if I had a printer to print out a return label I would return these.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bovee

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but doesn't meet battery life claimed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and sound of these earbuds but i only get about 6- 6 1/2 hours of battery life from a full charge. Not the advertised 10 hours like the description states. Which is disappointing because it was one of the main reasons i bought these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd pair of these
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear buds. They are a great design, I can listen a long time on a charge, and they are incredibly durable, I love that they attach to my shirt with a magnet and that the wires can be wrapped around and secured with the same magnet. . I have 3 pairs because I listen to books and courses a lot and switch them on and off the charger so I always have a fully charged pair. The extra pair is because I lost one set, ordered a new one and found the lost set out in my yard where it had been sitting in rain and snow for two weeks. They still worked fine. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine A. Ellor

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds for listening to music while biking
customer_reviews.text: We love to bike to music. Using our iPod minis. Too bad those are obsolete but ours work fine and we love them. But using corded iPhone earbuds was a hassle with the cord getting tied up with things and yanking them out. Now, no worries. Not very much bass but whadda ya want for this low price. I'll save up for the fancy Jabras or whatever someday, but for now, these'll do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Good Old Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Sounds better than  last version  👍
customer_reviews.text: I loved the old version. This one has the duel driver and way better sound . I'm a welder and the ifrogs all have a magnet clip that holds it onto my hat and I can tuck the wires under my hat and jam all day . Ps . I buy 2 and rotate charge them. Believe me I've busted ever bit of 100 types of ear buds. I just like these better.
customer_reviews.author: SPARKY

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, pair easily, awesome product. dual drivers are really responsive, and I love the power! I took off ONE star on the comfort scale because after wearing them for a really long time my ears did get a bit tender - but not a HUGE issue, and I would wear them anyway just to be cordless. My other issue is more about range, but ALL Bluetooth earphones have limited range, and I can't fault these for having a similar range.... Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Gausvik

customer_reviews.title: Long battery. Harsh sound.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the battery life. It worked for a continual 6 + hrs. I normally purchase the regular wireless ifrogz and absolutely love them. Buying another pair soon. But the Duo sound is sharp. Not a smooth crisp sound..harsh and sharp. Its possible i got a bad speaker or something. The treble is terrible and ive attempted to adjust it. Even had it hooked up to several devices. It's not my phone, it's the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: Dual Drivers sound great
customer_reviews.text: The dual drivers sound great, but they are not the most comfortable ear buds I have ever worn. These sound better than my $150+ LG HSB-1100s but they are not as comfortable to wear in the ear and the buds are bit gainly. I finally settled on putting them in upside down with the wire facing upwards and curving around the top and down the backside of my ear. I found them much more comfortable to wear this way. These buds last at least 8hrs on a single charge and now that I have found a good way to to wear them comfortably I can wear them without my ears hurting by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Shane C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound. Battery life inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sound and deep bass. Very loud earbuds and super comfy. Only thing I am dissappointed by is the battery life states 10 hours but I wear them at work and listen at moderate volumes and barely get 7 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Constantly falling out of my ears. I had another model I loved. These are too heavy/bulky to stay in the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Impulse Duo
customer_reviews.text: bought these after the impulse model was returned. I do not hear much deference in sound quality with the less expense model vs the more expensive duo. Sound much better after downloading app which increases bass
customer_reviews.author: tom b

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This BT device lacks features such as battery percentage; BT device only clips on. Ear pieces are not labeled L/R and you have to figure out which side fits best into your ear. I did not return because I didn’t feel like going through the hassle. I am a light user and battery life is not 10 hours. Without music - straight talk-time. I DO NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: KWLES

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I wear these at least 3 hours a day 5 days a week, mostly at the gym. They stay in my ears even with vigorous exercise.... and it helps drown out the other noises that are usually found at the gym, clanging, grunting, screaming and moaning....
customer_reviews.author: George Parry

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and fairly decent range! The battery last about 2 hours at max volume listening to music. But I can get it to last almost 4 hours at 60% volume listening to audiobooks. Comfortable to wear and convenient clip to put it on hats, helmets, collars. Would recommend to anyone looking for good bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Westover

customer_reviews.title: Aboslutely love these
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair (my first pair lasted over a year and a half). I have put them through every type of workou. From running marathons, to lifting, cycling, hiking and kayaking. These are an absolute must and will withstand sweat and heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Bought these as an open box
customer_reviews.text: The battery charge on this pair lasts about half of the first pair I bought some time ago. Yes, I paid less for them but received less quality at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: k.white

customer_reviews.title: My go to brand
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the sound quality I get from ifrogz, they have been my earphones of choice for awhile now. The number one selling point is the magnetic clip at the base that I can clip to my shirt. My one complaint is the beeping sound the headphones make sometimes when you click on your phone. I have yet to figure out how to turn it off, but it doesn’t distract from the quality at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, fit is good, battery life is about 6/7 hrs new for constant daily use. The battery wears about relatively quickly. After a few months of daily use the battery was only holding enough charge for about 4 hours, and after about 6/7 months, the battery barely holds enough charge for 90 minutes. If you want something that will last a long time with maximum daily usage, look elsewhere, but it's not a bad deal for the price if you're only recharging the battery once or twice a week instead of every day.
customer_reviews.author: John Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound ehh battery
customer_reviews.text: Great sound all around music, movies, and voice. Ppl can here me well. Battery is disappointing 5hrs on fresh charge. The magnet clip could be stronger. They do look nicer in person then in pic.
customer_reviews.author: cordeiro2740

customer_reviews.title: Free earwax - no thank you, Amazon Warehouse Deals
customer_reviews.text: Gross. MAYBE an Amazon Warehouse employee inspected this item. MAYBE the employee personally tested it and repacked it. It’s going back. Item is used and is NOT “like new”
customer_reviews.author: Bee9

customer_reviews.title: great sound, painful fit
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. BUT painful fit as another reviewer explained. And although I haven't had them long, the paint is scratching off already. Bluetooth does not work with my desktop, but works with my old Motorola Droid. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 3rd coaster

customer_reviews.title: Amazebuds
customer_reviews.text: Weird body interference... When my phone is in my back pocket and the headphone wireless receiver is on my collar, the sound seems to get choppy. But, it's an easy fix-just move the phone to the front side of my body. These put out some of the best sound I've gotten from earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: EYE-6

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can’t beat these. Excellent sound quality. This is 3td set. I lost the first two. I’ll continue to buy until there’s a better option, but at this quality and price I don’t see that happening. You won’t regret buying these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Good performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great earbuds for the price. Only criticism is the coating on the outside comes off after awhile with it in your pocket after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JDMGuam

customer_reviews.title: didn't last thru 2 charges : (
customer_reviews.text: charged twice and will no longer go on again...won't charge... good sound for the price - but not if it they don't last!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Beauchesne

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and give these a go.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are, quite simply, the best I've had. Clean sound, good battery life, and the magnetic clip are all just the cherry on top. When it comes to sound quality, these deliver. The price point is pretty attractive too, considering you can pay twice as much for a pair of Beats and get half the audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Grimm Gallows

customer_reviews.title: There ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife she says there great
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth set
customer_reviews.text: Sound and battery life are great. Word of caution if you have small ears don't buy as the dual speaker setup may cause fit issues and comfort even with the smallest ear tips
customer_reviews.author: rhonrader

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January of this year. It gave out just now, after less than 8 months of everyday use. Until now, I loved it. Sound quality was good, the clip was convenient. But I can't recommend after it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Rhee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these headphones - the first two pairs were great and probably would still work if I hadn’t misplaced them. Unfortunately, this pair will not hold a charge and die after 20 minutes. When I plug them in to charge they never fully charge - the best charge I’ve gotten is 80% but then they still die after 20 minutes. They also are very finicky with charging and won’t always charge unless you have the wire just right. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darsie Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Sound is fantastic. Was hesitant about the "clip on" aspect but ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fantastic. Was hesitant about the "clip on" aspect but its actually very nice to be able to roll up the wires the length you prefer and also have the option to clip it to clothing or your shirt
customer_reviews.author: Shane R Derby

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for 1/4 the price of my Bose
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the Ifrogz products but these really took me by storm. unfortunately the left side stopped working. I must reorder unless they are under any warranty? Here's your chance to earn a good review above and beyond. Or tell me what is the ifrogz next level up from the duo and I'll order those. I have to choose soon. Any input appreciated. Kevin S. Gallagher
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: I love these so much that I just ordered an additional pair!
customer_reviews.text: I also have other brands that I really like, but these are my very favorite because the sound is much better, and these are much lighter than any of the other brands. And the earbuds don't fall out!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 1 Ten

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and should have certainly lasted longer than this
customer_reviews.text: Although lightly used and after 3 months, the headset will not take a charge. Very disappointed and should have certainly lasted longer than this. If returning these are an option, that's exactly what I am doing
customer_reviews.author: Diana Walneck

customer_reviews.title: Stellar sound
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best ear buds I've ever heard, corded or wireless hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the pric2
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves these. They work good and have some what a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality for the price, and the clip is very convenient. And these get so loud! I always listened to music on the lowest volume setting, even on the subway. Battery life is pretty good, but they would die when I supposedly still had 1/4 battery life. I lost them a few days ago and am in mourning now 😭😭 these were terrific headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They work better than all of the expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts!
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones daily working out at the gym. Only had a few minor connection issues in the year I have owned them but they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: IFrogs Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones ever for the money. I like them better than my Beats by Dre.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Love these, except the battery life is short though
customer_reviews.text: Love these, except the battery life is short though. They are so small and easy to store in pocket, whatever. No wire around back of neck. Great design
customer_reviews.author: Rick Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds themselves are a bit large, but they sound great. I like to wear them skiing and my helmet pushes on them a bit, but they serve the purpose I bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great head phones but........
customer_reviews.text: Sound and comfort are just as good as headphones of greater quality. Only issue is after a couple days of moderate use the left headphone shorted out. Will be returning for an exchange
customer_reviews.author: Rick D

customer_reviews.title: Really love the earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Really love the earbuds. Haven’t been able to get 10 hrs of use out of them, but I use mine everyday for about 6-7 hrs straight. Love the sound quality. Would definitely get again
customer_reviews.author: Marlen

customer_reviews.title: Good price vs product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it a lot bu the earpiece, it feels like it’s going to slip out of my ear.
customer_reviews.author: maria giovanna castro

customer_reviews.title: Love these ear buds they hold charge like advertised and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these ear buds they hold charge like advertised and are very comfortable and easy to pair up with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: rdfgirl2010

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is non existent. Quit working after 6 months. Have to charge before each use even if it's been sitting for a day since the last charge. Sound is good and fit is comfortable but if it won't work for more than an hour regardless of volume, it doesn't matter. Try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not audiophile quality, but a good value for wireless earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle Scout Dad

customer_reviews.title: Shortest USB cable ever.
customer_reviews.text: shortest USB cable ever. uncomfortable fit in ears (not the end piece, but the overall design). doesn't turn off despite following instructions. you get what you pay for. (sound is fine)
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I used mine when I ran which was approximately 4 hours a week. After having them only 3 months they quit charging. I won’t be buying another pair of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Scott

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, practical and portable
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfortable. You can easily control your music (play/pause, next/back, volume up/volume down) from the earphone's base. The base is magnetic, so you can clip it to your clothes and it doesn't fall off. It's also small and light and the sound is still good.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Evans-Parker

customer_reviews.title: Overall good Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price. They fit well, and stay in my ear fine. The wires are a bit cumbersome, but sound is good and Bluetooth connection is great. I would definitely recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but...
customer_reviews.text: Although the sound quality is better than the cheaper models, the connection range is not as good. Also the volume does not go as low as I would like. Personally, if I do get a new set of frogz I’ll go with the basic one.
customer_reviews.author: William T Musick

customer_reviews.title: Not working good
customer_reviews.text: You cant even put the phone in your pocket while using the earphones. You have to hold the phone in your hand and put it right next to the earphones for it to work. Its wireless but you cant be away from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Keshet Mendicini

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just Buy em they are worth the money. I work in a machine shop and it gets really loud and I listen to music while I work and the max volume is so loud I have to turn them down and I have hearing damage from being a M1A2 tanker in the army
customer_reviews.author: Kingkouch89

customer_reviews.title: Not a good headphone
customer_reviews.text: The sound is too loud even turn down the volume. It hurts my ear and the battery life is not 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: FlowerDropss

customer_reviews.title: good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, good battery life, and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: wouldn't turn on or charge after approx 10 hours of usage over a month. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Very loud and works great always order the same ones! Like 4 times now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Robinette

customer_reviews.title: I really like them, the sound quality could be a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them, the sound quality could be a bit better but for this price it is really good. I can wear a motorcycle helmet easily with these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Augustus

customer_reviews.title: Battery life was much less than what is promised.
customer_reviews.text: Used them while working. Battery life was disappointing. Had to charge about every 3 hours. Good audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. My wife stole them because she likes them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. My wife stole them because she likes them so much..i bought another one so I could use them too. A++
customer_reviews.author: jim thompson

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality horrendous
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is horrendous. I don't understand what the raves are all about. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Benedict Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: It has good noise cancellation and bass sound is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rondón

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were going to be black, but I maybe should have checked better before I ordered
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had betterluck
customer_reviews.text: Bad luck....stopped charging then would get really hot. Button fell off. Really bummed! These are the best ones too!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hager

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound amazing! Very convenient and affordable for.such a great quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Surratt

customer_reviews.title: Could have better battery life
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, only stays charged for 5 hours of use
customer_reviews.author: soreshldr32

customer_reviews.title: Over all gr8
customer_reviews.text: Amazing base but there should be a fully wire less version
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro

customer_reviews.title: Best blue tooth ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Sound is crisp and don’t have to turn it up to hear music clearly...
customer_reviews.author: Norman J. Riel

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Love not having the cord to my iphone
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love not having the cord to my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: rjm

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: They did not stay on and lousy battery time Bluetooth disconnected all the time
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: They charge pretty fast. And I can listen for hours.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for the price. This is my third pair. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael R.

customer_reviews.title: I have found this product pretty useless since its main method of connection barely works
customer_reviews.text: I could get this to connect to my macbook and it sounded OK. I cannot get it to connect to my Samsung S7 phone at all. I have found this product pretty useless since its main method of connection barely works. Glad I still have my wired headphones. This iFrogz isn't very good.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Lux for iPhone x
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love them. Got them today. Paired easily with iPhone X. Great sound. Luxurious feel. Not for exercising I’d say bc of the soft material on them, but curling up Around the house is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Beadgirl

customer_reviews.title: The sound is ok and they're comfortable but they do not last anywhere near 10 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is ok and they're comfortable but they do not last anywhere near 10 hours before needing to be recharged. They're range isn't the best either. It's better than using wired earbuds but not much.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer m.

customer_reviews.title: The sound was very tinny and the earbuds weren't comfortable even with the smallest fittings
customer_reviews.text: The sound was very tinny and the earbuds weren't comfortable even with the smallest fittings. Paired easily and like the clip design.
customer_reviews.author: DKL

customer_reviews.title: Great for that price
customer_reviews.text: Great for that price. Good sound and battery life. Bluetooth connectivity is great. Small and lightweight. Actually so lightweight I once put it in the washing machine. After drying out 2 days it worked again. Innovative way to store the cord. Only con: the surface of the earplugs and the body look is some kind of felt and looks a bit ugly after a while. Not even the washing machine fixed that.
customer_reviews.author: Udo US

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good but they don't sync well with my laptop or ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the hype. Sound quality is good but they don't sync well with my laptop or phone. Took me forever to get them synced together.
customer_reviews.author: bournely

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ELECTRONIC MUSIC
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for Christmas. I ended up using them myself. they sound great, but not for bassy shit just be weary.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Conboy

product_meta.title: iFrogz Audio - Impulse Duo - Dual Driver Bluetooth Earbuds - Grey
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteImmerse yourself in sound with the Impulse Duo Wireless Earbuds. Their dynamic design features dual drivers in each earbud so that you can experience music in a new way. Two drivers per earbud means you get a whole lot more music. Fuller, richer sound awaits. Are you ready? Each earbud contains two drivers, which greatly increases your audio range. It means you get high and mid frequencies and a lot more bass. The blend of all three makes the sound fuller and your music experience richer. To accommodate two drivers in each earbud case, we use powerful but lightweight 6-mm neodymium magnets. Premium components means a richer, fuller sound for an enhanced listening experience.
feature_bullets: TWICE THE SOUND - Dual drivers in each earbud means more high- and mid-range frequencies and a lot more bass. The three-way blend makes the sound fuller and your music experience richer. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
FULL CONTROL - The clip-on wireless control features simple, intuitive buttons that keep your music and calls within reach, and the magnetic clip secures your earbuds when they're not in use
DESIGNED FOR COMFORT - Our sweat-resistant design meets IPX-2 standards to keep the music going through any workout. Three sizes of earbud tips ensures a perfect fit and maximum comfort
10 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE - Don't stop your beat to recharge. Ten hours of battery life between charges keeps your playlist going, song after song, while delivering powerful, crisp sound
EARBUD TIPS FOR LIFE - Our limited lifetime warranty means that if your earbud tips get worn or damaged, we will replace them. It's easy to claim a replacement on our website

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars229 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
